articles.author: POLITICO
articles.title: Utah school district returns the Bible to shelves after appeals and outcry - POLITICO
articles.description: Bibles will be returning to the shelves of a northern Utah school district after it banned them from middle and elementary schools last month. The Davis School District, which educates 72,000 students north of Salt Lake City, said at a board meeting that the district had determined the sacred text was age-appropriate for all district libraries. The board sided with 70 people who filed appeals after it was banned last month. The decision to remove the Bible vexed advocates for expanding local control and parents’ ability to challenge books.

articles.title: Live coverage: ULA scrubs Delta 4-Heavy launch attempt – Spaceflight Now - Spaceflight Now
articles.description: The United Launch Alliance's Delta 4-Heavy rocket was set to launch a classified spy satellite for the National Reconnaissance Office from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station, but the launch was scrubbed due to a problem with a ground systems pneumatics valve. Another launch attempt is scheduled for Thursday. The mission, codenamed NROL-68, has a launch window of about four hours. The Delta 4-Heavy rocket will haul into orbit a classified payload for the National Reconnaissance Office, believed to be a large spacecraft designed to intercept telephone calls, data transmissions, and other types of communication by U.S. adversaries.
articles.content: Watch our live coverage of the countdown and launch of a United Launch Alliance Delta 4-Heavy rocket with a classified spy satellite for the National Reconnaissance Office from Space Launch Complex 3… [+12260 chars]

articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.title: Miami Dolphins WR Tyreek Hill under investigation for alleged assault - USA TODAY
articles.description: Miami Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill is being investigated for an alleged assault/battery that occurred at a Miami Beach marina. The incident took place on Sunday, but no further details have been provided. Hill was on a fishing trip with his agent Drew Rosenhaus on the same day. The Dolphins are aware of the situation and have been in contact with Hill, his representatives, and the NFL. Hill caught 119 passes for 1,710 yards and seven touchdowns in 2022.

articles.author: POLITICO
articles.title: House Republicans move to consider private documents related to Hunter Biden tax probe - POLITICO
articles.description: House Ways and Means Committee Chair Jason Smith (R-Mo.) has called for a special executive session to review documents related to an IRS probe of Hunter Biden, which could lead to the public release of documents related to his taxes. Smith has the authority to consider documents that are otherwise barred from disclosure because they bear information related to a private citizen's tax information. The session will allow committee members to review IRS whistleblower claims regarding alleged political interference into an IRS case "involving a high-profile individual" and alleged retaliation by the agency that resulted in the removal of the entire investigative team on the case.
